trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete %1%?
This is a duplicate of record %1%
Contains a unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies a resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含能标记某资源的一个独一无二的标准数字或代码.

trans-unit.source: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters, normally appearing in a resource, that names it or the work contained in it. Choice and format of titles should be governed by a content standard such as the Anglo-American Cataloging Rules, 2nd edition (AACR2), Cataloguing Cultural Objects (CCO), or Describing Archives: A Content Standard (DACS). Details such as capitalization, choosing among the forms of titles presented on an item, and use of abbreviations should be determined based on the rules in a content standard. One standard should be chosen and used consistently for all records in a set.
trans-unit.target: 一个常出现并提及该资源或其包含的内容的单词, 词组, 字母, 或是一组字母. 标题的选择和格式应该符合一个内容标准, 比如英美编目条例, 第二版 (AACR2), 文化对象编目 (CCO), 或者档案描述內容标准 (DACS). 大写, 物件标题形式, 简写等细节内容应当遵循一个内容标准. 一套记录应当选择并持续使用同一标准.

trans-unit.source: A term that specifies the characteristics and general type of content of the resource. Assign as many types as are applicable. The Type of resource options are limited to the values in the MODS typeOfResource top-level element.
trans-unit.target: 详细说明资源特征和内容总体类型的术语. 指定所有适用类型. 资源类型选项限于MODS类型资源的最高级细目的值.

trans-unit.source: Add new child levels (if describing a collection)
trans-unit.target: 添加新的子层级(如果是描述一个收藏集)

trans-unit.source: Use these two fields to add lower levels to a collection-level description.
A designation of the language in which the content of a resource is expressed.
A term or phrase representing the primary topic(s) on which a work is focused.
Search for an existing term in the Places taxonomy by typing the first few characters
"Choose provenance, author and other non-subject access points from the archival
Information about restrictions imposed on access to a resource. See MODS accessCondition
Identifies the institution or repository holding the resource. Search for an
An abstract, table of contents or description of the resource's scope and contents.
trans-unit.target: 资源范围和内容的摘要, 目录或描述.

trans-unit.source: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. The country and repository code will be automatically added from the linked repository record to form a full reference code. (ISAD 3.1.1)
trans-unit.target: 提供明确的本地参考代码, 控制符号或其他唯一标识符. 国家和典藏库代码会自动从链接的典藏库记录中添加以组成完整的参考代码. (ISAD 3.1.1)

trans-unit.source: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions. (ISAD 3.1.2)
trans-unit.target: 依据多层级著录规则和国家惯例提供一个正式标题或是简要的补充标题. (ISAD 3.1.2)

trans-unit.source: "Identify and record the date(s) of the unit of description. Identify the type of date given. Record as a single date or a range of dates as appropriate.” (ISAD 3.1.3). The Date display field can be used to enter free-text date information, including typographical marks to express approximation, uncertainty, or qualification. Use the start and end fields to make the dates searchable. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty. Acceptable date formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.
trans-unit.target: "确认并记录著录单元的日期. 确认指定日期的类型. 根据需要记录日期或是日期范围.” (ISAD 3.1.3). 日期显示栏可用来输入自由文本日期信息, 包括表示大约, 不确定, 或条件的印刷字体符. 使用起始和结束栏来标记可搜索的日期. 不要使用任何限定词或印刷字体符来表示不确定. 可接受的日期格式: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.

trans-unit.source: Record the level of this unit of description. (ISAD 3.1.4)
trans-unit.target: 记录该著录单元的层级. (ISAD 3.1.4)

trans-unit.source: Identifier: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. Level of description: Record the level of this unit of description. Title: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions.
trans-unit.target: 标识符: 提供一个明确的本地参考代码, 控制数字, 或其他唯一标识符. 著录层级: 记录该著录单元的层级. 标题: 根据多层级著录规则和全国惯例提供一个正式标题或是精简的补充标题。

trans-unit.source: Record the extent of the unit of description by giving the number of physical or logical units in arabic numerals and the unit of measurement. Give the specific medium (media) of the unit of description. Separate multiple extents with a linebreak. (ISAD 3.1.5)
trans-unit.target: 记录著录单元的尺寸, 以阿拉伯数字和测量单位提供其物理或是逻辑单位的尺寸数值. 提供著录单元的明确媒介信息. 用换行符分隔多项尺寸. (ISAD 3.1.5)

trans-unit.source: This archival description, or one of its higher levels, requires at least one creator.
trans-unit.target: 该文献著录, 或其某一项高级描述, 要求至少一个创建者.

trans-unit.source: Record the name of the organization(s) or the individual(s) responsible for the creation,
Record the name of the organization which has custody of the archival material.

Record the successive transfers of ownership, responsibility and/or custody of the unit of description and indicate those actions, such as history of the arrangement, production of contemporary finding aids, re-use of the records for other purposes or software migrations, that have contributed to its present structure and arrangement. Give the dates of these actions, insofar as they can be ascertained. If the archival history is unknown, record that information. (ISAD 3.2.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录著录单元的所有权, 责任和/或保管的连续转移, 说明促进单元发展其当前结构和整理的各种活动, 诸如整理历史, 当代索引指南的产生, 基于其他目的对记录的重新使用或者软件迁移等. 如果这些活动的日期确定，则一并提供. 如果文献历史未知, 则如实记录. (ISAD 3.2.3)

trans-unit.source: Record the source from which the unit of description was acquired and the date and/or method of acquisition if any or all of this information is not confidential. If the source is unknown, record that information. Optionally, add accession numbers or codes. (ISAD 3.2.4)
trans-unit.target: 如果不是保密信息, 记录著录单元的来源以及入藏日期和/或方法. 如果来源未知, 则如实记录. 另外可以选择是否添加登记号或是代码. (ISAD 3.2.4)

trans-unit.source: Immediate source of acquisition or transfer
trans-unit.target: 入藏或转移的直接来源

trans-unit.source: Give a summary of the scope (such as, time periods, geography) and content, (such as documentary forms, subject matter, administrative processes) of the unit of description, appropriate to the level of description. (ISAD 3.3.1)
trans-unit.target: 依据著录的层级提供著录单元的范围(比如时期, 地理)和内容(比如文献形式, 主题, 管理程序)概要. (ISAD 3.3.1)

trans-unit.source: Record appraisal, destruction and scheduling actions taken on or planned for the unit of description, especially if they may affect the interpretation of the material. (ISAD 3.3.2)
trans-unit.target: 记录已完成或是计划中著录单元评估, 销毁和编目活动, 尤其是可能会影响资料阐释的活动.(ISAD 3.3.2)
评价, 销毁, 编制

trans-unit.source: Indicate if accruals are expected. Where appropriate, give an estimate of their quantity and frequency. (ISAD 3.3.3)
trans-unit.target: 说明典藏是否会有预期扩展. 如果适用, 给出藏品增添数量和频率的估计值. (ISAD 3.3.3)

trans-unit.source: Specify the internal structure, order and/or the system of classification of the unit of description. Note how these have been treated by the archivist. For electronic records, record or reference information on system design. (ISAD 3.3.4)
trans-unit.target: 说明著录单元的内部结构, 层级和/或分类体系. 加注说明文献员处理这些信息的方式. 对于电子记录, 记录或引用体系设计的信息. (ISAD 3.3.4)

trans-unit.source: Conditions of access and use area

Specify the law or legal status, contract, regulation or policy that affects access to the unit of description. Indicate the extent of the period of closure and the date at which the material will open when appropriate. (ISAD 3.4.1)
trans-unit.target: 说明影响检索著录单元的法律条款, 法律地位, 合同, 规则或政策. 如果适用, 说明资料停止对外开放的时间范围以及对外开放的起始日期.

trans-unit.source: Give information about conditions, such as copyright, governing the reproduction of the unit of description after access has been provided. If the existence of such conditions is unknown, record this. If there are no conditions, no statement is necessary. (ISAD 3.4.2)
trans-unit.target: 提供检索完成以后管理著录单元复制的相关条件, 比如版权. 如果不确定此类条件是否存在, 则如实记录. 如果此类条件不存在, 则不需要声明.(ISAD 3.4.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the language(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (ISAD 3.4.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录组成该著录单元的资料的语言. (ISAD 3.4.3)

trans-unit.source: Record the script(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (ISAD 3.4.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录组成该著录单元的资料的文字. (ISAD 3.4.3)

trans-unit.source: Note any distinctive alphabets, scripts, symbol systems or abbreviations employed. (ISAD 3.4.3)
trans-unit.target: 说明所使用的任何独特字母, 文字, 符号体系或是缩写. (ISAD 3.4.3)

trans-unit.source: Indicate any important physical conditions, such as preservation requirements, that affect the use of the unit of description. Note any software and/or hardware required to access the unit of description.
trans-unit.target: 说明影响著录单元使用的重要的物理条件信息, 比如保存要求. 说明检索著录单元所要求的任何软件和/或硬件信息.

trans-unit.source: Give information about any finding aids that the repository or records creator may have that provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit of description. If appropriate, include information on where to obtain a copy. (ISAD 3.4.5)
trans-unit.target: 对于典藏库或记录创建者可能具备的任何索引指南, 如果其能够提供与著录单元的背景及内容相关的信息, 陈述这些索引指南的信息. 如果适用, 一并说明在何处能够获取副本. (ISAD 3.4.5)

trans-unit.source: If the original of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. If the originals no longer exist, or their location is unknown, give that information. (ISAD 3.5.1)
trans-unit.target: 如果著录单元原件可用(在该机构或是其他地方), 记录其地点以及任何重要的管理符号. 如果原件不再存在或是地点位置, 则如实陈述. (ISAD 3.5.1)

trans-unit.source: If the copy of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. (ISAD 3.5.2)
trans-unit.target: 如果著录单元有副本(在本机构或是其他地方), 记录其地点以及任何相关的重要的管理编号. (ISAD 3.5.2)

trans-unit.source: Record information about units of description in the same repository or elsewhere that are related by provenance or other association(s). Use appropriate introductory wording and explain the nature of the relationship . If the related unit of description is a finding aid, use the finding aids element of description (3.4.5) to make the reference to it. (ISAD 3.5.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录同一典藏库中在来源或其他方面相关的著录单元的信息. 使用合适的介绍性文字并且解释其相互关系的性质. 如果相关的著录单元是索引指南, 使用著录的索引指南细目 (3.4.5) 以提及该单元. (ISAD 3.5.3)

trans-unit.source: To create a relationship between this description and another description held in AtoM,

Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 - Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code.
trans-unit.target: 根据地方和/或国家惯例记录唯一著录标识符. 如果著录将在国际范围内使用, 根据ISO 3166代码的最新版本记录著录创建国的国家代码, 以代表该国国名. 如果著录由一个国际组织创建, 提供该组织的标识符, 以代替国家代码.

trans-unit.source: Record the full authorised form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard.
trans-unit.target: 记录创建, 修改或传播该著录的机构的完整的规范名称, 或者根据国内或是国际单位代码标准记录该机构的认可代码.

trans-unit.source: Record the international, national and/or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description. (ISAD 3.7.2)
trans-unit.target: 记录起草著录所遵循的国际, 国内和/或当地规则或惯例. (ISAD 3.7.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the current status of the description, indicating whether it is a draft, finalized and/or revised or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 记录著录的当前状态, 指明其是草稿, 最终版本和/或修订版，还是已删除.

trans-unit.source: Record whether the description consists of a minimal, partial or full level of detail in accordance with relevant international and/or national guidelines and/or rules.
trans-unit.target: 根据相关的国际和/或国家指南和/或规则记录著录包括最小量, 部分还是全部细节.

trans-unit.source: Record the date(s) the entry was prepared and/or revised.
trans-unit.target: 记录该条目起草和/或修改的日期.

trans-unit.source: Dates of creation, revision and deletion
trans-unit.target: 创建, 修改以及删除日期

trans-unit.source: Indicate the language(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: 说明创建文献资料著录所使用的语言.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the script(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: 说明创建文献资料著录所使用的文字.

trans-unit.source: Record citations for any external sources used in the archival description (such as the Scope and Content, Archival History, or Notes fields).
trans-unit.target: 记录文献著录所使用的任何外部资源的引用信息(比如在范围和内容版块, 文献历史版块, 或是注释栏中).
创建 修改 删除 日期
档案信息包(AIP)通用唯一识别码

trans-unit.source: The unambiguous reference code used to uniquely identify this resource.
trans-unit.target: 标识该资源的唯一参考代码.

trans-unit.source: The name given to this resource.
The topic of the resource. Search for an existing term in the Subject taxonomy

The nature or genre of the resource.

Assign as many types as applicable. The Type options are limited to the DCMI Type vocabulary.

Assign the Collection value if this resource is the top-level for a set of lower-level (child) resources.

Please note: if this resource is linked to a digital object, the image, text, sound or moving image types are added automatically upon output, so do not duplicate those values here.
trans-unit.target:
资源体裁的性质.

赋值所有适用的类型. Type 选项仅限于DCMI类型的词汇.

如果该资源总领一套子层级资源, 则为其赋值 Collection.

请注意: 如果该资源链接到一个数字对象, image, text, sound or moving image 类型将会自动添加到输出内容, 因此请不要在此重复相关的值.

trans-unit.source:
Child levels
Use these two fields to add lower

The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

Please note: if this resource is linked to a digital object, the Internet Media Types (MIME) will be added automatically upon output, so don't duplicate those values here.
trans-unit.target:
资源的文件格式, 物理媒介, 或是维度.

请注意: 如果该资源链接到一个数字对象, 网络媒体类型 (MIME) 会被自动添加到输出内容, 因此请不要在此重复相关的值.

trans-unit.source: Related material(s) from which this resource is derived.
trans-unit.target: 该资源的相关原始资料

trans-unit.source: This is a mandatory element for this resource or one of its
The name of the organization which has custody of the resource.
The name of a place or geographic area which is a topic of the resource
Information about rights held in and over the resource (e.g. copyright, access conditions, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 有关该资源的权利信息 (比如版权, 获取条件等).

trans-unit.source: Identify and record the date(s) of the unit of description.
Identify and record the name(s) and type(s) of the unit of description.
trans-unit.target: 确认并记录描述单元的名称和类型.
编辑 %1% - 档案规范记录国际标准(ISAAR)

trans-unit.source: "Specify the type of entity that is being described in this authority record." (ISAAR 5.1.1) Select Corporate body, Family or Person from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: "详细说明该规范记录所著录的实体的类型." (ISAAR 5.1.1) 从下拉单中选择团体, 家庭或个人.

trans-unit.source: "Record the standardized form of name for the entity being described in accordance with any relevant national or international conventions or rules applied by the agency that created the authority record. Use dates, place, jurisdiction, occupation, epithet and other qualifiers as appropriate to distinguish the authorized form of name from those of other entities with similar names." (ISAAR 5.1.2)
trans-unit.target: "根据创建规范记录的单位所遵循的相关国内或国际惯例或规则记录著录实体的标准名称. 使用日期, 地点, 司法权, 工作, 附加说明词以及其他限定词将该机构的规范名称和与其名称类似的其他机构的规范名称相区别." (ISAAR 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To indicate the various forms in which the Authorized form of name occurs in other languages or script form(s). Rule: record the parallel form(s) of name in accordance with any relevant national or international conventions or rules applied by the agency that created the authority record, including any necessary sub elements and/or qualifiers required by those conventions or rules." (ISAAR 5.1.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 指明规范名称在其他语言或文字中的各种形式. 规则: 根据创建规范记录的单位所遵循的相关国内或国际惯例或规则记录并列名称, 包括这些惯例和规则所要求的任何必需的次细目以及/或者限定词." (ISAAR 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record the standardized form of name for the entity being described in accordance with other conventions or rules. Specify the rules and/or if appropriate the name of the agency by which these standardized forms of name have been constructed." (ISAAR 5.1.4)
trans-unit.target: "根据其他惯例或规则记录著录实体的标准名称. 具体说明构建标准名称的规则和/或机构名称(如果适用)." (ISAAR 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: Standardized form(s) of name according to other rules
trans-unit.target: 根据其他规则的名称标准形式

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this field is to "indicate any other name(s) for the corporate body, person or family not used elsewhere in the Identity Area." Examples are acronyms, previous names, pseudonyms, maiden names and titles of nobility or honour. (ISAAR 5.1.5)
trans-unit.target: 该栏的目的是 "说明没有在身份版块中被使用的团体, 个人或家庭的其他名称." 比如名称首字母缩写, 曾用名, 假名, 婚前名, 头衔或荣誉称号. (ISAAR 5.1.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record where possible any official number or other identifier (e.g. a company registration number) for the corporate body and reference the jurisdiction and scheme under which it has been allocated." (ISAAR 5.1.6)
trans-unit.target: "如果可能, 记录团体的官方编号或其他识别号(比如公司注册号)并且说明管辖该团体的司法权和机制." (ISAAR 5.1.6)

trans-unit.source: "Record the dates of existence of the entity being described. For corporate bodies include the date of establishment/foundation/enabling legislation and dissolution. For persons include the dates or approximate dates of birth and death or, when these dates are not known, floruit dates. Where parallel systems of dating are used, equivalences may be recorded according to relevant conventions or rules. Specify in the Rules and/or conventions element (5.4.3) the system(s) of dating used, e.g. ISO 8601." (ISAAR 5.2.1)
trans-unit.target: "记录著录实体的存在日期. 对于团体实体, 包括成立/奠基/合法化以及解体的日期. 对于个人, 包括出生和死亡日期或估计日期, 如果日期未知, 则包括其全盛期. 当使用并列计时系统时, 可根据相关惯例或规则记录等值信息. 在规则和/或惯例细目(5.4.3)中指明所使用的计时系统, 比如 ISO 8601." (ISAAR 5.2.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record in narrative form or as a chronology the main life events, activities, achievements and/or roles of the entity being described. This may include information on gender, nationality, family and religious or political affiliations. Wherever possible, supply dates as an integral component of the narrative description." (ISAAR 5.2.2)
trans-unit.target: "用叙事方式或大事记年表方式记录著录实体的的主要事件, 活动, 成就和/或职能. 这可以包括性别, 国籍, 家庭和宗教或政治背景. 如有可能, 在叙事描述中提供日期信息." (ISAAR 5.2.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: to indicate the predominant places and/or jurisdictions where the corporate body, person or family was based, lived or resided or had some other connection. Rule: record the name of the predominant place(s)/jurisdiction(s), together with the nature and covering dates of the relationship with the entity." (ISAAR 5.2.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 指明团体, 个人或家庭办公, 生活或居住或是有其他联系的主要地点和/或管辖区. 规则: 记录主要地点/管辖区的名称, 以及实体内该关系的性质和起讫日期." (ISAAR 5.2.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record the legal status and where appropriate the type of corporate body together with the covering dates when this status applied." (ISAAR 5.2.4)
trans-unit.target: "记录团体的法律地位, 如果适用, 同时记录该团体类型. 同时记录其法律地位有效的起讫日期." (ISAAR 5.2.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record the functions, occupations and activities performed by the entity being described, together with the covering dates when useful. If necessary, describe the nature of the function, occupation or activity." (ISAAR 5.2.5)
trans-unit.target: "记录著录实体所行使的职能, 从事的工作和活动, 一并记录有用的起讫日期信息. 如有需要, 描述职能, 工作和活动的性质." (ISAAR 5.2.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record any document, law, directive or charter which acts as a source of authority for the powers, functions and responsibilities of the entity being described, together with information on the jurisdiction(s) and covering dates when the mandate(s) applied or were changed." (ISAAR 5.2.6)
trans-unit.target: "记录为著录实体的权力, 职能和责任提供权威依据的任何文献, 法律, 指令或宪章, 一并记录相关司法权信息以及权力生效或改变的起讫日期." (ISAAR 5.2.6)

trans-unit.source: "Describe the internal structure of a corporate body and the dates of any changes to that structure that are significant to the understanding of the way that corporate body conducted its affairs (e.g. by means of dated organization charts). Describe the genealogy of a family (e.g. by means of a family tree) in a way that demonstrates the inter-relationships of its members with covering dates." (ISAAR 5.2.7)
trans-unit.target: "描述团体内部结构, 如果其结构变化有助于理解该团体管理事务的方式(比如有日期记录的组织结构图), 则一并描述变化发生的日期. 描述家谱(比如家谱图)以展示成员之间的内部关系(标明日期的)." (ISAAR 5.2.7)

trans-unit.source: "Provide any significant information on the social, cultural, economic, political and/or historical context in which the entity being described operated." (ISAAR 5.2.8)
trans-unit.target: "提供关于所著录的实体的所有重要的社会, 文化, 经济, 政治和/或历史背景信息." (ISAAR 5.2.8)

trans-unit.source: "Record a unique authority record identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the authority record is to be used internationally, record the country code of the country in which the authority record was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the authority record is an international organization, give the organizational identifier in place of the country code." (ISAAR 5.4.1)
trans-unit.target: "根据地区或全国惯例记录规范记录的唯一标识符. 如果规范记录将在国际范围内使用, 根据ISO 3166代码的最新版本记录规范记录创建国的国家代码, 以此代表该国国名. 如果规范记录由一个国际组织创建, 提供该组织的标识符, 以代替国家代码." (ISAAR 5.4.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record the full authorized form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the authority record or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard. Include reference to any systems of identification used to identify the institutions (e.g. ISO 15511)." (ISAAR 5.4.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录负责创建, 修改或传播该规范记录的机构的完整的规范名称, 或者根据国内或是国际单位代码标准记录该机构的认可代码. 说明用以确认该机构的任何身份识别系统(比如 ISO 15511)." (ISAAR 5.4.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To identify the national or international conventions or rules applied in creating the archival authority record. Rule: Record the names and where useful the editions or publication dates of the conventions or rules applied. Specify separately which rules have been applied for creating the Authorized form of name. Include reference to any system(s) of dating used to identify dates in this authority record (e.g. ISO 8601)." (ISAAR 5.4.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 确认用以创建文献规范记录的国内或国际惯例或规则. 规则: 记录所应用的惯例或规则的名称, 如有需要, 一并记录其版本或出版日期. 另外单独说明哪些规则被用以创建规范名称. 包括用以确认该规范记录中日期的计时系统的参考信息 (比如 ISO 8601)." (ISAAR 5.4.3)

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this field is "[t]o indicate the drafting status of the authority record so that users can understand the current status of the authority record." (ISAAR 5.4.4). Select Final, Revised or Draft from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 该栏的目的是 "说明规范记录的初稿状态, 以便使用者理解规范记录的当前状态." (ISAAR 5.4.4). 从下拉单中选择定稿, 已修改或初稿.

trans-unit.source: Select Full, Partial or Minimal from the drop-down menu. "In the absence of national guidelines or rules, minimal records are those that consist only of the four essential elements of an ISAAR(CPF) compliant authority record (see 4.8), while full records are those that convey information for all relevant ISAAR(CPF) elements of description." (ISAAR 5.4.5)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择完整, 部分或最小. "如果没有全国通用指南或规则, 最小记录仅包括组成 ISAAR(CPF)适用的规则记录的四项基本细目 (见 4.8). 完整记录包括表达所有相关的ISAAR(CPF)著录细目的信息." (ISAAR 5.4.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record the date the authority record was created and the dates of any revisions to the record." (ISAAR 5.4.6)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建规范记录的日期以及任何修改该记录的日期." (ISAAR 5.4.6)

trans-unit.source: Select the language(s) of the authority record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISAAR 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择规范记录的语言; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISAAR 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: Select the script(s) of the authority record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISAAR 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择该规范记录的文字; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISAAR 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: "Record the sources consulted in establishing the authority record." (ISAAR 5.4.8)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建规范记录所参考的资料." (ISAAR 5.4.8)

trans-unit.source: "Record notes pertinent to the creation and maintenance of the authority record. The names of persons responsible for creating the authority record may be recorded here." (ISAAR 5.4.9)
trans-unit.target: "记录与创建和维护规范记录相关的注释. 此处也可以记录负责创建该规范记录的人员的名字." (ISAAR 5.4.9)

trans-unit.target: 编辑 %1% - 档案保管机构描述国际标准(ISDIAH)

trans-unit.source: "Record the numeric or alpha-numeric code identifying the institution in accordance with the relevant international and national standards." (ISDIAH 5.1.1)
trans-unit.target: "根据相关国际或国内标准记录用以确认机构的数字或字母数字代码." (ISDIAH 5.1.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record the standardised form of name of the institution, adding appropriate qualifiers (for instance dates, place, etc.), if necessary. Specify separately in the Rules and/or conventions used element (5.6.3) which set of rules has been applied for this element." (ISDIAH 5.1.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录机构的标准名称, 如有需要, 添加适当的限定词 (比如日期, 地点等). 另外在规则和/或惯例细目(5.6.3)中指明该细目所应用的规则." (ISDIAH 5.1.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To indicate the various forms in which the authorised form of name of an institution occurs in other languages or script form(s). Rule: Record the parallel form(s) of name of the institution in accordance with any relevant national or international conventions or rules applied by the agency that created the description, including any necessary sub elements and/or qualifiers required by those conventions or rules. Specify in the Rules and/or conventions used element (5.6.3) which rules have been applied." (ISDIAH 5.1.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 指明一个机构的规范名称在其他语言或文字中的各种形式. 规则: 根据著录单位所遵循的相关国内或国际惯例或规则记录该机构的并列名称, 包括这些惯例和规则所要求的任何必需的次细目以及/或者限定词. 在规则和/或惯例部分(5.6.3)明确说明所应用的规则." (ISDIAH 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record any other name(s) by which the institution may be known. This could include other forms of the same name, acronyms, other institutional names, or changes of name over time, including, if possible, relevant dates." (ISDIAH 5.1.4)
trans-unit.target: "记录该机构可能为人所知的其他名称. 这包括统一名称的其他形式, 首字母缩写, 其他名称, 或历来更名(如果可能，一并提供更名的日期)." (ISDIAH 5.1.4)

trans-unit.source: Record the type of the institution. (ISDIAH 5.1.5) Select as many types as desired

"Record any relevant information about the history of the institution. This element may include information on dates of establishment, changes of names, changes of legislative mandates, or of any other sources of authority for the institution." (ISDIAH 5.3.1)
trans-unit.target: "记录有关该机构历史的相关信息. 该细目包括该机构创立, 更名, 改变司法职责的日期信息, 或是该机构的任何权力来源." (ISDIAH 5.3.1)

trans-unit.source: "Identify the geographical area the institution belongs to. Record any other relevant information about the cultural context of the institution." (ISDIAH 5.3.2)
trans-unit.target: "标明该机构的地理位置. 记录关于该机构文化背景的任何相关信息." (ISDIAH 5.3.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record any document, law, directive or charter which acts as a source of authority for the powers, functions and responsibilities of the institution, together with information on the jurisdiction(s) and covering dates when the mandate(s) applied or were changed." (ISDIAH 5.3.3)
trans-unit.target: "记录为该机构的权力, 职能和责任提供权威依据的任何文献, 法律, 指令或宪章, 一并记录相关司法权信息以及权力生效或改变的起讫日期." (ISDIAH 5.3.3)

trans-unit.source: "Describe, in narrative form or using organisational charts, the current administrative structure of the institution." (ISDIAH 5.3.4)
trans-unit.target: "用叙事形式或组织结构图方式描述该机构当前的行政管理结构." (ISDIAH 5.3.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record information about the records management and collecting policies of the institution. Define the scope and nature of material which the institution accessions. Indicate whether the repository seeks to acquire archival materials by transfer, gift, purchase and/or loan. If the policy includes active survey and/or rescue work, this might be spelt out." (ISDIAH 5.3.5)
trans-unit.target: "记录与该机构的记录管理和收集政策相关的信息. 详细解释该机构所登记的资料的范围与性质. 指明该典藏库是否通过转移, 礼物, 购买和/或借用方式寻求文献资料. 如果其政策包括活跃的调查和/或修缮, 阐明相关信息." (ISDIAH 5.3.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record information on the building(s) of the institution (general and architectural characteristics of the building, capacity of storage areas, etc). Where possible, provide information which can be used for generating statistics." (ISDIAH 5.3.6)
trans-unit.target: "记录该机构的建筑物信息(一般特征和建筑物设计特征, 存放区容量等). 如果可能, 提供可以生成数据的信息." (ISDIAH 5.3.6)

trans-unit.source: "Record a short description of the holdings of the institution, describing how and when they were formed. Provide information on volume of holdings, media formats, thematic coverage, etc." (ISDIAH 5.3.7)
trans-unit.target: "简要描述该机构的馆藏, 描述它们是如何以及何时入藏. 提供有关馆藏量, 媒介形式, 收藏主题等信息." (ISDIAH 5.3.7)

trans-unit.source: "Record the title and other pertinent details of the published and/or unpublished finding aids and guides prepared by the institution and of any other relevant publications. Use ISO 690 Information and documentation – Bibliographic references and other national or international cataloguing rules." (ISDIAH 5.3.8)
trans-unit.target: "记录由该机构制定的已发布和/或未发布的索引指南和指南的标题及其他相关细节以及其他任何相关的发布信息. 使用ISO 690 信息和著录 – 参考文献以及其他国内或国际编目规则." (ISDIAH 5.3.8)
索引指南, 指南和发布

trans-unit.source: "Record the opening hours of the institution and annual, seasonal and public holidays, and any other planned closures. Record times associated with the availability and/or delivery of services (for example, exhibition spaces, reference services, etc.)." (ISDIAH 5.4.1)
trans-unit.target: "记录机构的开放时间, 年度, 季节和公共节假日, 以及任何其他计划内的关闭时间. 记录与各项服务是否可用和/或交付的时间(比如展区, 咨询服务等)." (ISDIAH 5.4.1)

trans-unit.source: "Describe access policies, including any restrictions and/or regulations for the use of materials and facilities. Record information about registration, appointments, readers’ tickets, letters of introduction, admission fees, etc. Where appropriate, make reference to the relevant legislation." (ISDIAH 5.4.2)
trans-unit.target: "描述检索政策, 包括有关使用资料及设施的任何限制和/或规则. 记录有关注册, 预约, 读者借阅单, 介绍信, 接收费等. 如果适用, 引用相关法律." (ISDIAH 5.4.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record information about travelling to the institution and details for users with disabilities, including building features, specialised equipment or tools, parking or lifts." (ISDIAH 5.4.3)
trans-unit.target: "为有残疾的使用者记录前往该机构的行程信息, 包括建筑物特征, 专业设备或工具, 停车场或是电梯." (ISDIAH 5.4.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record information about the onsite services provided by the institution such as languages spoken by staff, research and consultation rooms, enquiry services, internal libraries, map, microfiches, audio-visual, computer rooms, etc. Record as well any relevant information about research services, such as research undertaken by the institution, and the fee charge if applicable." (ISDIAH 5.5.1)
trans-unit.target: "记录该机构提供的现场服务信息, 比如工作人员的语言, 研究和咨询办公室, 询问服务, 内部图书馆, 地图, 缩微平片, 音视频, 计算机房等. 一并记录与研究服务相关的信息, 比如该机构从事的研究, 如果适用, 同时记录收费信息." (ISDIAH 5.5.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record information about reproduction services available to the public (microfilms, photocopies, photographs, digitised copies). Specify general conditions and restrictions to the services, including applicable fees and publication rules." (ISDIAH 5.5.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录对外公开的复制服务信息(缩微胶卷, 复印件, 照片, 数码复印件). 具体说明服务的一般条件和限制, 包括费用和出版规则." (ISDIAH 5.5.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record information about spaces available for public use (permanent or temporary exhibitions, free or charged internet connection, cash machines, cafeterias, restaurants, shops, etc.)." (ISDIAH 5.5.3)
trans-unit.target: "记录对外公开的空间信息(长期或临时展览, 费用或是收费网络服务, 取款机, 咖啡馆, 餐馆, 商店等)." (ISDIAH 5.5.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 - Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code." (ISIAH 5.6.1)
trans-unit.target: "根据地区或全国惯例记录唯一著录标识符. 如果著录将在国际范围内使用, 根据ISO 3166代码的最新版本记录著录创建国的国家代码, 以代表该国国名. 如果著录由一个国际组织创建, 提供该组织的标识符, 以代替国家代码." (ISIAH 5.6.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record the full authorised form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard." (ISDIAH 5.6.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建, 修改或传播该著录的机构的完整的规范名称, 或者根据国内或是国际单位代码标准记录该机构的认可代码." (ISDIAH 5.6.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record the names, and, where useful, the editions or publication dates of the conventions or rules applied. Specify, separately, which rules have been applied for creating the Authorised form(s) of name. Include reference to any system(s) of dating used to identify dates in this description (e.g. ISO 8601)." (ISDIAH 5.6.3)
trans-unit.target: "记录所应用的惯例或规则的名称, 如有需要, 记录其版本或是出版日期. 另外明确说明创建规范名称所应用的规则. 包括该著录用以确认日期的计时系统参照 (比如 ISO 8601)." (ISDIAH 5.6.3)

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this field is "[t]o indicate the drafting status of the description so that users can understand the current status of the description." (ISDIAH 5.6.4). Select Final, Revised or Draft from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 该栏的目的是 "说明著录的初稿状态, 以便使用者理解著录的当前状态." (ISDIAH 5.6.4). 从下拉单中选择定稿, 已修改或初稿.

trans-unit.source: Select Full, Partial or Minimal from the drop-down menu. "In the absence of national guidelines or rules, minimal descriptions are those that consist only of the three essential elements of an ISIAH compliant description (see 4.7), while full records are those that convey information for all relevant ISDIAH elements of description." (ISDIAH 5.6.5)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择完整, 部分或最小. "如果没有全国通用指南或规则, 最小著录仅包括组成ISIAH适用著录的三项基本细目 (见 4.7). 完整记录包括表达所有相关的ISDIAH著录细目的信息." (ISDIAH 5.6.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record the date the description was created and the dates of any revisions to the description." (ISDIAH 5.6.6)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建该著录的日期以及任何修改该著录的日期." (ISDIAH 5.6.6)

trans-unit.source: Select the language(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDIAH 5.6.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择该记录的语言; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISDIAH 5.6.7)

trans-unit.source: Select the script(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDIAH 5.6.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择该记录的文字; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISDIAH 5.6.7)

trans-unit.source: "Record the sources consulted in establishing the description of the institution." (ISDIAH 5.6.8)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建机构著录所参考的资料." (ISDIAH 5.6.8)

trans-unit.source: "Record notes pertinent to the creation and maintenance of the description." (ISDIAH 5.6.9)
trans-unit.target: "记录与该著录的创建和维护相关的说明." (ISDIAH 5.6.9)

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing term in the Thematic Areas taxonomy by typing the first few
Search for an existing term in the Geographic Subregion taxonomy by typing the first

trans-unit.target: 标明记录是全部注销还是部分注销.

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a meaningful formal title, compose a brief title that uniquely identifies the material, normally consisting of a name segment, a term indicating the nature of the unit being described, and optionally a topical segment. Do not enclose devised titles in square brackets. (DACS 2.3.3)
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少有意义的正是标题, 创建一个能单独标识该资料的简短标题, 该标题通常包括一个名称段, 一个说明著录单元性质的术语, 以及一个主题段(最后一项非必须). 不要将创建的标题置于方括号内. (DACS 2.3.3)

trans-unit.source: Record dates of creation, record-keeping activity, publication, or broadcast as appropriate to the materials being described. (DACS 2.4.3) The Date display field can be used to enter free-text date information, including typographical marks to express approximation, uncertainty, or qualification. Use the start and end fields to make the dates searchable. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols. Acceptable date formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.
trans-unit.target: 记录与著录材料相关的创建日期, 记录保存活动, 发布, 或是广播. (DACS 2.4.3) 日期显示栏可用来输入自由文本日期信息, 包括表示大约, 不确定, 或条件的印刷字体符. 使用起始和结束栏来标记可搜索的日期. 不要使用任何限定词或印刷字体符来表示不确定. 可接受的日期格式: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.

trans-unit.source: Record the quantity of the material in terms of its physical extent as linear or cubic feet, number of items, or number of containers or carriers. (DACS 2.5.4). Optionally, record the quantity in terms of material type(s) (DACS 2.5.5), and/or qualify the statement of physical extent to hightlight the existence of material types that re important (DACS 2.5.6).
trans-unit.target: 记录资料的线性或立方英尺, 物件数量, 容器量或载体量. (DACS 2.5.4). 以下两项内容非必需: 记录与资料类型相关的数量(DACS 2.5.5), 和/或描述其物理尺寸陈述以强调重要的资料类型(DACS 2.5.6).

trans-unit.source: Record information about the nature of the materials and activities reflected in the unit being described to enable users to judge its potential relevance, including information about functions, activities, transations, and processes; documentary form(s) or intellectual characteristics; content dates; geographic areas and places; subject matter; completeness of the materials; or any other information that assists the user in evaluating the relevance of the materials. (DACS 3.1)
trans-unit.target: 记录与著录单元所反应的资料和活动的性质相关的信息, 以便使用者判断其可能具有的相关性, 包括与职能, 活动, 交易和处理相关的信息; 文献形式或知识特征; 内容日期; 地理区域和地点; 主题; 资料的完整程度; 或其他有助于使用者评估资料相关性的任何信息. (DACS 3.1)

trans-unit.source: Describe the current arrangement of the material in terms of the various aggregations within it and their relationships. (DACS 3.2.3)
trans-unit.target: 根据该资料内部各种集合及它们之间的关系来描述其当前的整理. (DACS 3.2.3)

trans-unit.source: Conditions of access and use elements

Give information about any restrictions on access to the unit being described (or parts thereof) as a result of the nature of the information therein or statutory/contractual requirements. As appropriate, specify the details of the restriction. If there are no restrictions, state that fact. (DACS 4.1.5)
trans-unit.target: 提供关于限制检索著录单元(或部分内容)的信息, 限制条件可能源自单元内容的性质或是法律/合同要求. 如果适用, 提供限制条件的细节信息. 如果没有任何检索限制, 则如实陈述. (DACS 4.1.5)

trans-unit.source: Provide information about the physical characteristics or condition of the unit being described that limit access to it or restrict its use. (DACS 4.2.5)
trans-unit.target: 提供限制著录单元检索或使用的物理特征或条件等相关信息. (DACS 4.2.5)

trans-unit.source: Provide information about any special equipment required to view or access the unit being described, if it is not clear from the Extent element. (DACS 4.3.5)
trans-unit.target: 提供查看或检索著录单元所必需的任何特殊设备的信息, 如果该信息在尺寸细目中没有清楚标明. (DACS 4.3.5)

trans-unit.source: Give information about copyright status and any other conditions governing the reproduction, publication, and further use (e.g., display, public screening, broadcast, etc.) of the unit being described after access has been provided. (DACS 4.4.5)
trans-unit.target: 提供著录单元版权信息以及完成检索以后管理著录单元复制, 出版和进一步使用(比如展示, 公开放映, 广播等)的其他条件信息. (DACS 4.4.5)
管理复制和使用的条件

trans-unit.source: Record the language(s) of the materials being described. (DACS 4.5.2)
trans-unit.target: 记录所著录的资料的语言. (DACS 4.5.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the scripts(s) of the materials being described.
trans-unit.target: 记录所著录的资料的文字.

trans-unit.source: Record information about any distinctive alphabets, scripts, symbol systems, or abbreviations employed (DACS 4.5.3). If there is no language content, record “no linguistic content.” (DACS 4.5.4)
trans-unit.target: 记录与所使用的独特的字母, 文字, 符号体系或简写相关的信息 (DACS 4.5.3). 如果没有语言内容, 则记录"没有语言内容." (DACS 4.5.4)

trans-unit.source: Record information about any existing finding aids that provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit being described... including any relevant information about its location or availability, and any other information necessary to assist the user in evaluating its usefulness. Include finding aids prepared by the creator (e.g., registers, indexes, etc.) that are part of the unit being described. (DACS 4.6.2)
trans-unit.target: 记录能够提供著录单元背景和内容相关信息的任何已存在的索引指南的信息... 包括地点信息, 可用性以及其他有助于使用者评估其有用性的信息. 包括由创建者准备的并组成著录单元一部分的检索指南. (DACS 4.6.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the successive transfers of ownership, responsibility, or custody or control of the unit being described from the time it left the possession of the creator until its acquisition by the repository, along with the dates thereof, insofar as this information can be ascertained and is significant to the user’s understanding of the authenticity. (DACS 5.1.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录著录单元从离开创建者到入藏这段时间内其所有权, 责任或保管(控制)的连续转移, 如果这些活动的日期确定并有助于使用者理解其可靠性，则一并提供. (DACS 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: Record the source(s) from which the materials being described were acquired, the date(s) of acquisition, and the method of acquisition, if this information is not confidential. (DACS 5.2.3)
trans-unit.target: 如果非保密信息, 记录著录资料的入藏来源, 日期和方式. (DACS 5.2.3)

trans-unit.source: Where the destruction or retention of archival materials has a bearing on the interpretation and use of the unit being described, provide information about the materials destroyed or retained and provide the reason(s) for the appraisal decision(s), where known. (DACS 5.3.4)
trans-unit.target: 如果文献资料的销毁或保留对著录单元的阐释和使用有影响, 提供资料销毁或保留的相关信息, 如果评估决定的原因已知, 则一并提供. (DACS 5.3.4)

trans-unit.source: If known, indicate whether or not further accruals are expected. When appropriate, indicate frequency and volume. (DACS 5.4.2)
trans-unit.target: 如果已知, 说明藏品是否有预期的增加. 如果适用, 说明增加的频率和数量. (DACS 5.4.2)

trans-unit.source: If the materials being described are reproductions and the originals are located elsewhere, give the location of the originals (DACS 6.1.4). Record any identifying numbers that may help in locating the originals in the cited location (DACS 6.1.6).
trans-unit.target: 如果著录资料是复制件并且原件在其他地方, 提供原件地点(DACS 6.1.4). 记录有助于在原件地点定位该原件的任何标识符号(DACS 6.1.6).

trans-unit.source: If a copy of all or part of the material being described is available, in addition to the originals, record information about the medium and location of the copy, any identifying numbers, and any conditions on the use or availability of the copy. If a copy of only a part of the unit being described is available, indicate which part. If the materials being described are available via remote access (electronically or otherwise), provide the relevant information needed to access them. (DACS 6.2.3)
trans-unit.target: 如果著录资料的全部或部分内容有副本可用, 除原件信息以外, 记录关于副本媒介, 馆藏地, 标识符号信息以及其他有关副本使用或可用性的信息. 如果著录单元部分内容有副本, 说明是哪些部分. 如果著录资料能够通过远程检索获取(以电子方式或其他方式), 提供检索所需要的信息.(DACS 6.2.3)

trans-unit.source: If there are materials that have a direct and significant connection to those being described by reason of closely shared responsibility or sphere of activity, provide the title, location, and, optionally, the reference number(s) of the related materials and their relationship with the materials being described. (DACS 6.3.5)
trans-unit.target: 如果有资料与著录资料有直接并重要的联系, 比如有共同的责任或是活动范围, 提供相关资料的标题, 藏地, 参考代码以及其与著录资料的关系(后两项非必填内容). (DACS 6.3.5)

trans-unit.source: Record relevant information about sources consulted in establishing or revising the description. (DACS 8.1.3)
trans-unit.target: 记录创建或修改著录过程中参考的资源的相关信息. (DACS 8.1.3)

trans-unit.source: Record the international, national or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description. (DACS 8.1.4)
trans-unit.target: 记录起草著录所遵循的国际, 国内和/或当地规则或惯例. (DACS 8.1.4)

编辑 %1% - 档案信息系统职能描述国际标准(ISDF)

trans-unit.source: "Specify whether the description is a function or one of its subdivisions." (ISDF 5.1.1) Select the type from the drop-down menu; these values are drawn from the ISDF Function Types taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: "具体说明该著录是一项职能还是某职能的一部分." (ISDF 5.1.1) 从下拉单中选择类型; 这些值来自ISDF职能类型分类.

trans-unit.source: "Record the authorised name of the function being described. In cases where the name is not enough, add qualifiers to make it unique such as the territorial or administrative scope, or the name of the institution which performs it. This element is to be used in conjunction with the Function description identifier element (5.4.1)." (ISDF 5.1.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录所著录的职能的规范名称. 如果名称不足以区分该职能, 为使名称独一无二, 可添加限定词, 如地域范围或管理范围, 或者是行使该职能的机构的名称. 该细目与职能著录标识符细目共同使用 (5.4.1)." (ISDF 5.1.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To indicate the various forms in which the authorized form(s) of name occurs in other languages or script forms. Rule: Record the parallel form(s) of name in accordance with any relevant national or international conventions or rules applied by the agency that created the description, including any necessary sub elements and/or qualifiers required by those conventions or rules. Specify in the Rules and/or conventions element (5.4.3.) which rules have been applied." (ISDF 5.1.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 指明一个机构的规范名称在其他语言或文字中的各种形式. 规则: 根据著录单位所遵循的相关国内或国际惯例或规则记录该机构的并列名称, 包括这些惯例和规则所要求的任何必需的次细目以及/或者限定词. 在规则和/或惯例部分(5.4.3.)明确说明所应用的规则." (ISDF 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record any other names for the function being described." (ISDF 5.1.4)
trans-unit.target: "记录所著录的职能的其他名称." (ISDF 5.1.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record any term and/or code from a classification scheme of functions. Record the classification scheme used in the element Rules and/or conventions used (5.4.3)." (ISDF 5.1.5)
trans-unit.target: "依据职能分类法记录任何术语和/或代码. 在所使用的规则和/或惯例细目 (5.4.3)中记录分类方法." (ISDF 5.1.5)

trans-unit.source: "Provide a date or date span which covers the dates when the function was started and when it finished. If a function is ongoing, no end date is needed." (ISDF 5.2.1)
trans-unit.target: "提供行使和完成职能的日期或是日期范围. 如果一个职能仍在运行, 则不需要提供结束日期." (ISDF 5.2.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record a narrative description of the purpose of the function." (ISDF 5.2.2)
trans-unit.target: "用叙事描述方式记录该职能的目的." (ISDF 5.2.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record in narrative form or as a chronology the main events relating to the function." (ISDF 5.2.3)
trans-unit.target: "用叙事方式或大事记年表方式记录与该职能相关的主要事件." (ISDF 5.2.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record any law, directive or charter which creates, changes or ends the function." (ISDF 5.2.4)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建, 改变或结束该职能的任一法律, 指示或纲领." (ISDF 5.2.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code." (ISDF 5.4.1)
trans-unit.target: "根据地区或全国惯例记录著录的唯一标识符. 如果著录将在国际范围内使用, 根据ISO 3166代码的最新版本记录著录创建国的国家代码, 以此代表该国国名. 如果著录由一个国际组织创建, 提供该组织的标识符, 以代替国家代码." (ISDF 5.4.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record the full authorised form of name(s) of agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a recognized code for the agency." (ISDF 5.4.2)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建, 修改或传播该著录的机构的完整的规范名称, 或者记录该机构的认可代码." (ISDF 5.4.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To identify the national or international conventions or rules applied in creating the archival description. Rule: Record the names and where useful the editions or publication dates of the conventions or rules applied." (ISDF 5.4.3)
trans-unit.target: "目的: 确认适用于创建文献著录的国内或国际惯例或规则. 规则: 记录所应用的惯例或规则的名称, 如有需要, 一并记录其版本或出版日期 ." (ISDF 5.4.3)

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this field is "[t]o indicate the drafting status of the description so that users can understand the current status of the description." (ISDF 5.4.4). Select Final, Revised or Draft from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 该栏的目的是 "说明著录的初稿状态, 以便使用者理解著录的当前状态." (ISDF 5.4.4). 从下拉单中选择定稿, 已修改或初稿.

trans-unit.source: Select Full, Partial or Minimal from the drop-down menu. "In the absence of national guidelines or rules, minimum records are those that consist only of the three essential elements of an ISDF compliant record (see 4.7), while full records are those that convey information for all relevant ISDF elements of description." (ISDF 5.4.5)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择完整, 部分或最小. "如果没有全国通用指南或规则, 最小记录仅包括组成 ISDF适用的记录的三项基本细目 (见 4.7). 完整记录包括表达所有相关的ISDF著录细目的信息." (ISDF 5.4.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record the date the description was created and the dates of any revisions to the description." (ISDF 5.4.6)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建该著录的日期以及任何修改该著录的日期." (ISDF 5.4.6)

trans-unit.source: Dates of creation, revision or deletion
trans-unit.target: 创建, 修改或删除日期

trans-unit.source: Select the language(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择该记录的语言; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISDF 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: Select the script(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择该记录的文字; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围. (ISDF 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: "Record the sources consulted in establishing the function description." (ISDF 5.4.8)
trans-unit.target: "记录创建职能著录所参考的资料." (ISDF 5.4.8)

trans-unit.source: "Record notes pertinent to the creation and maintenance of the description." (ISDF 5.4.9)
trans-unit.target: "记录与该著录的创建和维护相关的说明." (ISDF 5.4.9)

trans-unit.source: Select the name from the drop-down menu; enter the identifier
Select the title from the drop-down menu; enter the identifier
"Record the authorised form of name and any unique identifier
"Record a general category into which the relationship
"Record a precise description of the nature of the relationship

trans-unit.target: 点击确认从系统中删除该物理储存. 这也会将物理存储位置从以下记录中移除:

You are creating an accrual to accession %1%
trans-unit.target: 你正在为馆藏库 %1% 添加新的入藏.

trans-unit.source: Accession number should be a combination of values recorded in the field and should be a unique accession number for the repository
trans-unit.target: 登记号应当是该栏数个值的组合，并且应当是典藏库中独一无二的号码.

trans-unit.source: Server error while checking identifer availability.
Accession date represents the date of receipt of the materials and is added during the donation process.
trans-unit.target: 登记日期是指接收材料的日期，在捐赠过程中添加.

trans-unit.source: Identify immediate source of acquisition or transfer, and date and method of acquisition IF the information is NOT confidential.
trans-unit.target: 标明入藏或转移的直接来源, 入藏日期和方法, 如果这些不是保密信息.

trans-unit.source: A description of the physical location in the repository where the accession can be found.
trans-unit.target: 描述该登记资料在典藏库中的物理位置

trans-unit.source: Term describing the type of accession transaction and referring to the way in which the accession was acquired.
trans-unit.target: 描述藏品交易类型以及指代获取该藏品的方式的术语

trans-unit.source: Select the type of resource represented in the accession, either public or private.
trans-unit.target: 选择资源类型, 公开或是私有.

trans-unit.source: The title of the accession, usually the creator name and term describing the format of the accession materials.
trans-unit.target: 登记标题, 通常是创建者的名字以及描述藏品资料格式的术语.

trans-unit.source: The name of the creator of the accession or the name of the department that created the accession.
trans-unit.target: 创建该登记的个人或部门的名字

trans-unit.source: Information on the history of the accession. When the accession is acquired directly from the creator, do not record an archival history but record the information as the Immediate Source of Acquisition.
trans-unit.target: 登记历史信息. 如果登记直接获取于创建者, 不要记录文献历史, 但是将该信息记录为入藏直接来源.

trans-unit.source: A description of the intellectual content and document types represented in the accession.
trans-unit.target: 关于藏品的文献类型和智识内容的描述.

trans-unit.source: Record appraisal, destruction and scheduling actions taken on or planned for the unit of description, especially if they may affect the interpretation of the material.
trans-unit.target: 记录已完成或是计划中著录单元评估, 销毁和编目活动, 尤其是可能会影响资料阐释的活动.

trans-unit.source: A description of the physical condition of the accession and if any preservation or special handling is required.
trans-unit.target: 描述藏品的物理条件以及是否需要维护或其他特别处理.

trans-unit.source: The number of units as a whole number and the measurement of the received volume of records in the accession.
trans-unit.target: 典藏库中所接收的记录单元总量

trans-unit.source: An indicator of the accessioning process.
Indicates the priority the repository assigns to completing the processing of the accession.
trans-unit.target: 说明典藏库中完成该登记过程的优先权.

trans-unit.source: Notes about the processing plan, describing what needs to be done for the accession to be processed completely.
trans-unit.target: 关于处理计划的说明, 描述完成登记过程所需要做的事.

trans-unit.source: This is the legal entity field and provides the contact
Type: Enter a name for the alternative identifier field that
Enter the title proper, either transcribed or supplied. (RAD 1.1B)
trans-unit.target: 输入抄录或补充的正题名. (RAD 1.1B)

trans-unit.source: Select the General Material Designation at the highest level of description. If there are more than three, select "multiple media" (RAD 1.1C)
trans-unit.target: 在最高著录层级选择一般资料名称. 如果媒介多于三项, 选择"多重媒介" (RAD 1.1C)

trans-unit.source: "[W]hen applicable, transcribe parallel titles that appear in conjunction with the formal title proper..." (RAD 1.1D)
trans-unit.target: "如果适用, 抄录和正式正题名一起出现的并列标题..." (RAD 1.1D)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe other title information that appears in conjunction with the formal title proper..." (RAD 1.1E)
trans-unit.target: “抄录正式正题名以外的标题信息...” (RAD 1.1E)

trans-unit.source: "At the item level of description, transcribe explicit statements of responsibility appearing in conjunction with the formal title proper in or on the chief source of information..." (RAD 1.1F)
trans-unit.target: "对于物件著录, 抄录主要信息来源中与正式正题名一起出现的明确的责任声明..." (RAD 1.1F)

trans-unit.source: Select a level of description from the drop-down menu. See RAD 1.0A for rules and conventions on selecting levels of description.
trans-unit.target: 从下拉单中选择著录层级. 有关选择著录层级的规则和惯例, 参见RAD 1.0A.

trans-unit.source: Identifier: Enter an unambiguous code used to uniquely identify the description. Level: Select a level of description from the drop-down menu. See RAD 1.0A for rules and conventions on selecting levels of description. Title: Enter the title proper, either transcribed or supplied. (RAD 1.1B)
trans-unit.target: 标识符: 输入一个准确识别该著录的独一无二的代码. 层级: 从下拉选单中选择一个著录层级. 根据RAD 1.0A 的规则和惯例选择著录层级. 标题: 输入抄录或是补充的正题名, (RAD 1.1B)

trans-unit.source: Select the repository that has custody and control of the archival material.
Enter an unambiguous code used to uniquely identify the description.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个用以标识著录的唯一代码.

trans-unit.source: "Use this area only in item level description to record statements relating to versions of items existing in two or more versions or states in single or multiple copies." (RAD 1.2A1) "Transcribe the edition statement relating to the item being described." (RAD 1.2B1) "If the item being described lacks an edition statement but is known to contain significant changes from other editions, supply a suitable brief statement in the language and script of the title proper and enclose it in square brackets." (RAD 1.2B3)
trans-unit.target: "仅在物件层级著录中使用该版块记录以在单个或是多个副本中以两种或多种版本(或状态)存在的物件的版本声明." (RAD 1.2A1) "抄录与著录物件相关的版本声明." (RAD 1.2B1) "如果著录物件缺少版本声明, 但是与之前版本相比具有很大改动, 并且这些改动已知, 则用正标题的语言和文字作简要说明, 并将说明至于方括号内." (RAD 1.2B3)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe a statement of responsibility relating to one or more editions, but not to all editions, of the item being described following the edition statement if there is one." (RAD 1.2.C1) "When describing the first edition, give all statements of responsibility in the Title and statement of responsibility area." (RAD 1.2C2)
trans-unit.target: "如有版本声明，则抄录与所描述项目的一个或多个版本 (但不是所有版本) 相关的责任声明." (RAD 1.2.C1) "描述首版时, 记录标题和责任声明版块中所有的责任声明." (RAD 1.2C2)

trans-unit.source: Statement of responsibility relating to the edition
trans-unit.target: 与该版本相关的责任声明

trans-unit.source: "Give the scale of the unit being described...as a representative fraction (RF) expressed as a ratio (1: ). Precede the ratio by Scale. Give the scale even if it is already recorded as part of the title proper or other title information." (RAD 5.3B1)
trans-unit.target: "以数字比例尺 (RF)的方式提供著录单元的比例..., 其表达方式为比例 (1: ). 在比例尺一词后附上相应比例. 即使比例尺已出现在正标题或其他标题信息中, 仍需提供比例尺说明." (RAD 5.3B1)

trans-unit.source: "Give the statement of projection if it is found on the prescribed source(s) of information." (RAD 5.3C1)
trans-unit.target: "如果在指定的信息来源中找到投影声明, 则提供这一信息." (RAD 5.3C1)

trans-unit.source: "At the fonds, series or file levels, record coordinates for the maximum coverage provided by the materials in the unit, as long as they are reasonably contiguous." (RAD 5.3D)
trans-unit.target: "在宗卷, 系列或文件层级, 记录单元资料所提供的最大覆盖的坐标值, 只要这些信息前后一致." (RAD 5.3D)

trans-unit.source: "Give in English the scale in the units of measure found on the unit being described. If there is no English equivalent for the name of the unit of measure, give the name, within quotation marks, as found on the unit being described." (RAD 6.3B)
trans-unit.target: "用英语描述著录单元所使用的测量单位范围. 如果测量单位在英语中没有对应表达方式, 则提供其名称, 并将名称置于引号内" (RAD 6.3B)

trans-unit.source: "Give the name of the jurisdiction (e.g., government) responsible for issuing the philatelic records." (RAD 12.3B1) "For all units possessing a denomination (e.g., postage stamps, revenue stamps, postal stationery items), give the denomination in a standardized format, recording the denomination number in arabic numerals followed by the name of the currency unit. Include a denomination statement even if the denomination is already recorded as part of the title proper or other title information." (RAD 12.3C1)
trans-unit.target: "提供负责发行邮票记录的管辖机构 (比如政府)." (RAD 12.3B1) "对于所有具有面额的单位 (比如邮票, 印花税票, 邮政用品), 用标准格式提供其面额信息, 即面额值的阿拉伯数字加上货币单位名称. 即使面额已被记录在正题名或其他标题信息中, 仍需提供面额声明." (RAD 12.3C1)
发行方管辖权和名称 (集邮的)

trans-unit.source: "At all levels record the extent of the unit being described by giving the number of physical units in arabic numerals and the specific material designation as instructed in subrule .5B in the chapter(s) dealing with the broad class(es) of material to which the unit being described belongs." (RAD 1.5B1) Include other physical details and dimensions as specified in RAD 1.5C and 1.5D. Separate multiple entries in this field with a carriage return (i.e. press the Enter key on your keyboard).
trans-unit.target: "在所有著录层级, 记录著录单元的尺寸. 根据处理(著录单元所属的)广泛资料类别的章节中次规则 .5B, 使用阿拉伯数字和明确的材料名称, 提供著录单元的物理单位量." (RAD 1.5B1) 包括RAD 1.5C和1.5D中标明的物理细节和维度. 该栏中用回车符隔开多个条目 (即使用回车键).

trans-unit.source: "At the item level of description, transcribe a title proper of the publisher's series as instructed in 1.1B1." (RAD 1.6B)
trans-unit.target: "对于物件著录, 根据1.1B1抄录出版社连续出版物的正题名." (RAD 1.6B)
出版社连续出版物的正题名

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe parallel titles of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1D." (RAD 1.6C1)
trans-unit.target: "根据1.1D抄录出版社连续出版物的并列标题." (RAD 1.6C1)
出版社连续出版物的并列标题

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe other title information of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1E and only if considered necessary for identifying the publisher's series." (RAD 1.6D1)
trans-unit.target: "根据1.1E抄录有助于识别、确认出版社连续出版物的其他书名信息." (RAD 1.6D1)

trans-unit.source: Other title information of publisher's series
trans-unit.target: 出版社连续出版物的其他标题信息

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe explicit statements of responsibility appearing in conjunction with a formal title proper of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1F and only if considered necessary for identifying the publisher's series." (RAD 1.6E1)
trans-unit.target: "根据1.1F抄录有助于识别、确认出版社连续出版物的与正式正标题一起出现的明确的责任声明." (RAD 1.6E1)

trans-unit.source: Statement of responsibility relating to publisher's series
trans-unit.target: 与出版社连续出版物相关的责任声明

trans-unit.source: "Give the numbering of the item within a publisher's series in the terms given in the item." (RAD 1.6F1)
trans-unit.target: "根据物件本身条件提供该物件在出版社连续出版物中的编号." (RAD 1.6F1)
出版社连续出版物编号

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on important details of publisher's series that are not included in the Publisher's series area, including variant series titles, incomplete series, and of numbers or letters that imply a series." (RAD 1.8B10)
trans-unit.target: "如果出版社连续出版物的一些重要细节信息没有包括在出版社连续出版物版块中, 则加注说明这些信息, 包括该连续出版物的其他系列标题, 非成套系列, 以及暗示其属于系列出版物的数字或字母." (RAD 1.8B10)
对出版社连续出版物的说明

trans-unit.source: "Give the history of the custody of the unit being described, i.e., the successive transfers of ownership and custody or control of the material, along with the dates thereof, insofar as it can be ascertained." (RAD 1.7C)
trans-unit.target: "提供著录单元的保管历史, 比如所有权和保管或是资料控制的连续转移, 如果转移日期确定, 则一并提供." (RAD 1.7C)

trans-unit.source: "At the fonds, series, and collection levels of description, and when necessary at the file and the item levels of description, indicate the level being described and give information about the scope and the internal structure of or arrangement of the records, and about their contents." (RAD 1.7D) "For the scope of the unit being described, give information about the functions and/or kinds of activities generating the records, the period of time, the subject matter, and the geographical area to which they pertain. For the content of the unit being described, give information about its internal structure by indicating its arrangement, organization, and/or enumerating its next lowest level of description. Summarize the principal documentary forms (e.g., reports, minutes, correspondence, drawings, speeches)." (RAD 1.7D1)
trans-unit.target: "对于宗卷, 系列, 收藏集层级的著录 (如有需要, 包括文件和物件层级的著录), 说明著录层级并且提供有关记录范围和内部结构或整理的信息, 及其内容." (RAD 1.7D) "对于单元范围, 提供生成记录的职能和/或活动, 时间, 主题以及与记录相关的地理区域等信息. 对于单元内容, 提供其内部结构信息, 说明其整理, 组织, 和/或列举其下一最低层级著录. 总结主要的文献形式 (比如报告, 会议记录, 通信, 绘画, 演讲稿)." (RAD 1.7D1)

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on the physical condition of the unit being described if that condition materially affects the clarity or legibility of the records." (RAD 1.8B9a)
trans-unit.target: "如果著录单元的物理条件对记录的清晰度和易读性有实际影响, 加注说明该物理条件 ." (RAD 1.8B9a)

trans-unit.source: "Record the donor or source (i.e., the immediate prior custodian) from whom the unit being described was acquired, and the date and method of acquisition, as well as the source/donor's relationship to the material, if any or all of this information is not confidential. If the source/donor is unknown, record that information." (RAD 1.8B12)
trans-unit.target: 如果不是保密信息, 记录捐赠者或是该著录单元的入藏来源(比如前一位监管者), 以及该来源/捐赠者与该资料的关系. 如果来源/捐赠者未知, 则如实记录. (RAD 1.8B12)

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on the arrangement of the unit being described which contribute significantly to its understanding but cannot be put in the Scope and content (see 1.7D), e.g., about reorganisation(s) by the creator, arrangement by the archivist, changes in the classification scheme, or reconstitution of original order." (RAD 1.8B13)
trans-unit.target: "如果整理信息有助于理解著录单元但不属于范围和内容版块, 则加注记录该信息 (见 1.7D), 比如创建者的重新组织, 文献员的整理, 分类方法的改变或者重新排序." (RAD 1.8B13)

trans-unit.source: "Record the language or languages of the unit being described, unless they are noted elsewhere or are apparent from other elements of the description." (RAD 1.8.B14). Select the language from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices.
trans-unit.target: "记录著录单元的语言, 除非语言信息在其他地方已标注或是在其他著录细目中显而易见. 一并注明所使用的任何独特的字母或符号系统."(RAD 1.8.B14). 从下拉单中选择语言; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围.

trans-unit.source: "Note any distinctive alphabets or symbol systems employed." (RAD 1.8.B14) Select the script from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices.
trans-unit.target: "说明所使用的所有独特的字母或符号系统." (RAD 1.8.B14) 从下拉选单中选择文字; 输入前几个字母以缩小选择范围.

trans-unit.source: "Record the language or languages of the unit being described, unless they are noted elsewhere or are apparent from other elements of the description. Also note any distinctive alphabets or symbol systems employed." (RAD 1.8B14). Do not duplicate information added via the drop-down in the language or script fields.
trans-unit.target: "记录著录单元的语言, 除非语言信息在其他地方已标注或是在其他著录细目中显而易见. 一并注明所使用的任何独特的字母或符号系统." (RAD 1.8B14). 不要复制通过语言或文字栏的下拉单添加的信息.

trans-unit.source: "If the unit being described is a reproduction and the location of the original material is known, give that location. Give, in addition, any identifying numbers that may help in locating the original material in the cited location. If the originals are known to be no longer extant, give that information." (RAD 1.8B15a)
trans-unit.target: "如果著录单元是复制品并且原件地点已知, 提供原件地点. 另外, 提供有助于定位原件在馆藏地的识别号. 如果原件不再存在, 则如实记录." (RAD 1.8B15a)

trans-unit.source: "If all or part of the unit being described is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) in another format(s), e.g., if the text being described is also available on microfilm; or if a film is also available on videocassette, make a note indicating the other format(s) in which the unit being described is available and its location, if that information is known. If only a part of the unit being described is available in another format(s), indicate which parts." (RAD 1.8B15b)
trans-unit.target: "如果该著录单元整体或部分(在该机构或是其他地方)具有其他存在格式, 比如著录文本有缩微胶卷格式; 或电影有录影带格式, 并且如果这些信息已知, 则加注说明该单元的其他存在格式及其地点. 如果该著录单元部分内容具有其他存在格式, 需要标明是哪些部分." (RAD 1.8B15b)

trans-unit.source: "Give information about any restrictions placed on access to the unit (or parts of the unit) being described." (RAD 1.8B16a)
trans-unit.target: "提供限制检索该单元(或者该单元的某些部分)的相关信息." (RAD 1.8B16a)

trans-unit.source: For terms governing use and reproduction, "Give information on legal or donor restrictions that may affect use or reproduction of the material." (RAD 1.8B16c). For terms governing publication, "Give information on legal or donor restrictions that may affect publication of the material." (RAD 1.8B16d)
trans-unit.target: 对于管理使用和复制的条件, "提供可能影响资料使用或复制的法律限制或捐赠者限制信息." (RAD 1.8B16c). 对于管理出版的条件, "提供可能影响资料发表的法律限制或捐赠者限制信息." (RAD 1.8B16d)

trans-unit.source: Terms governing use, reproduction, and publication
trans-unit.target: 控制使用, 复制, 和发布的术语

trans-unit.source: "Give information regarding the existence of any finding aids. Include appropriate administrative and/or intellectual control tools over the material in existence at the time the unit is described, such as card catalogues, box lists, series lists, inventories, indexes, etc." (RAD 1.8B17)
trans-unit.target: "提供有关任何索引指南的存在信息. 包括在单元著录阶段针对现存资料的合适的管理和/或智能控制工具, 比如卡片目录, 邮箱列表, 系列列表, 详细目录, 索引等." (RAD 1.8B17)

trans-unit.source: For associated material, "If records in another institution are associated with the unit being described by virtue of the fact that they share the same provenance, make a citation to the associated material at the fonds, series or collection level, or for discrete items, indicating its location if known." (RAD 1.8B18). For related material, "Indicate groups of records having some significant relationship by reason of shared responsibility or shared sphere of activity in one or more units of material external to the unit being described." (RAD 1.8B20)
trans-unit.target: 对于彼此相关的资料, "如果另一个机构的记录与著录单元因为有共同的出处而相关, 则在宗卷, 系列或收藏集层级提及并引用相关的资料; 如果是单个物件并且其藏地已知, 则一并说明." (RAD 1.8B18). 对于相关的资料, "说明几组记录之间有着重要的联系, 因为它们在一个或多个在著录单元之外的单元中有共同的责任或是活动范围." (RAD 1.8B20)

trans-unit.source: "When the unit being described is not yet complete, e.g., an open fonds or series, make a note explaining that further accruals are expected... If no further accruals are expected, indicate that the unit is considered closed." (RAD 1.8B19)
trans-unit.target: "如果著录单元尚未完整, 比如一个开放性宗卷或系列, 加注说明藏品将会增加... 如果不再有预期的藏品增加, 则指明该单元已完整." (RAD 1.8B19)

trans-unit.source: "Give the International Standard Book Number (ISBN), International Standard Serial Number (ISSN), or any other internationally agreed standard number for the item being described. Give such numbers with the agreed abbreviation and with the standard spacing or hyphenation." (RAD 1.9B1)
trans-unit.target: "提供著录物件的国际标准书号 (ISBN), 国际标准期刊号 (ISSN), 或者任何其他国际通用的标准号码. 提供这些号码需使用通用字母缩写以及标准空格或连字符." (RAD 1.9B1)

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing term in the Subjects taxonomy by typing the first few
Search for an existing term in the Places taxonomy by typing the first few
Search for an existing term in the Genre taxonomy by typing the first few
Record the international, national and/or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description.
trans-unit.target: 记录起草著录所遵循的国际, 国内和/或当地规则或惯例.

trans-unit.source: Record citations for any external sources used in the archival description (such as the Scope and Content, Custodial History, or Notes fields).
trans-unit.target: 记录文献著录所使用的任何外部资源的引用信息(比如在范围和内容版块, 文献历史版块, 或是注释栏中).
出版社连续出版物的并列标题

trans-unit.source: Use this interface to update the authorized form of name, slug (permalink), and/or %1% filename.
Editing the authorized form of name will automatically update the slug field if the "Update slug" checkbox is selected - you can still edit it after.
A slug based on this name already exists so a number has been added to pad the slug.
